summary.body: I was airing my slacks on the balcony of the apartment (yes, I know we're not supposed to do that, but it was an emergency!) but the wind must have taken them... I don't suppose anybody has seen a pair of Zandra Rhodes emerald green palazzo pants in the vicinity of Shakespeare tower?
summary.subject: Look out below!

summary.body: Brown box found on 28/10 inside Andrewes House, next to street level doors (next to Crowders Wells). It has ABC self storage printed on the sides. I've posted one notice in the block for the owner to claim it, but no takers so far. I'm giving it to the Estate Office tomorrow (Mon 07/11).
summary.subject: Did you lose a box?

summary.body: I have found an oyster card just inside the fireman's entrance to John  Trundle Court from Aldersgate Street.  It appears to be a top-up card rather than a one-off and I am sure the owner would like it back as soon as possible.  Just to further identify the card, it is in an blue Oyster wallet with the card one side and an underground map on the other - the back of the underground map has a telephone number on it.  If the card is yours, please reply to this message so that I can get it back to you as quickly as possible.
summary.subject: Found - Oyster Card
